How to treat cred defs in ES?
```
      {
        "_index" : "txs",
        "_type" : "_doc",
        "_id" : "K5NO1m0B4WDrmaZDhHF4",
        "_score" : 1.0,
        "_source" : {
          "rootHash" : "DpKtY85axn3UsSJF8XjhYdZ2Xw6FfRXs3pHY5gJ4Zcuc",
          "auditPath" : [
            "FA1vR7rzQMmAdDbWarG3Pq3YLHC1PUFQeoFu2NsTR7Jj",
            "6KXLR3aBVHCeZcSQRFoh54jMES1i3koiwgom3YPuHuCJ",
            "E8Kzg3K3VQujqBVGv3t2coJaMwbDai1XhrNsxUDo9qvJ",
            "DfPf8Lp94SZ8bDcAzfbLevnedfkPU7P5C1nZ1bKqMX1D",
            "3wsgjDJLixB18VjdKwFGqMTj1EuxzC4cdxFPS2vXL79q"
          ],
          "reqSignature" : {
            "type" : "ED25519",
            "values" : [
              {
                "value" : "3791dENJFAkbffX9PwVBzeCLA6TC6TzPFRErcQcxykRFiZcwf55uR6dj5aseW6tqT2bSLWnesCJwrqKuDx3SGL36",
                "from" : "Niaxv2v4mPr1HdTeJkQxuU"
              }
            ]
          },
          "txnMetadata" : {
            "txnTime" : 1521146997,
            "seqNo" : 186,
            "txnId" : "Niaxv2v4mPr1HdTeJkQxuU:3:CL:185:tag"
          },
          "ver" : "1",
          "txn" : {
            "metadata" : {
              "reqId" : 1521146995476535800,
              "from" : "Niaxv2v4mPr1HdTeJkQxuU",
              "digest" : "675910860859ce951ccf66cb7a48f306345abe72e706e1b034c13a7f2fcb412e"
            },
            "type" : "102",
            "data" : {
              "signature_type" : "CL",
              "ref" : 185,
              "data" : {
                "revocation" : { },
                "primary" : {
                  "s" : "",
                  "n" : "",
                  "z" : "",
                  "rctxt" : "",
                  "rms" : "",
                  "r" : {
                    "Issue Date" : "",
                    "Hair Color" : "",
                    "Weight" : "",
                    "Donor?" : "",
                    "Expires" : "",
                    "Eye Color" : "",
                    "First Name" : "",
                    "Home Address" : "",
                    "Last Name" : "",
                    "Driver License #" : "",
                    "Height" : ""
                  }
                }
              }
            }
          }
        }
      }
```

By default indexing this results in having fields like
```
txn.data.data.primary.r.Eye Color
```
in ElasticSearch. 

We already have information about the fields themselves in schema documments
```
{
        "_index" : "txs",
        "_type" : "_doc",
        "_id" : "JJNO1m0B4WDrmaZDg3Fl",
        "_score" : 1.0,
        "_source" : {
          "reqSignature" : {
            "type" : "ED25519",
            "values" : [
              {
                "value" : "2TEDgVqYPnwDGsQ23NEMTYqQ2TRk3QEidjrtFn8Q6B79Tk5zeDvHy6GHgGhWbUWijw5GCQJ5aNQKFFL3muLRKPb7",
                "from" : "Niaxv2v4mPr1HdTeJkQxuU"
              }
            ]
          },
          "txnMetadata" : {
            "txnId" : "Niaxv2v4mPr1HdTeJkQxuU:2:Utah DMV1521142381745:1.0",
            "seqNo" : 179,
            "txnTime" : 1521142383
          },
          "rootHash" : "4r1WmazAdNVGnWBo79QMEucC34x5Du6Ao8Xvr1dBimGc",
          "ver" : "1",
          "txn" : {
            "metadata" : {
              "digest" : "7ebe820af3308bff73e7504d66fcc7175179fd68357c76b060679cf599140f36",
              "reqId" : 1521142381787037000,
              "from" : "Niaxv2v4mPr1HdTeJkQxuU"
            },
            "type" : "101",
            "data" : {
              "data" : {
                "name" : "Utah DMV1521142381745",
                "version" : "1.0",
                "attr_names" : [
                  "First Name",
                  "Last Name",
                  "Address",
                  "DOB",
                  "Driver License Class",
                  "Hair Color",
                  "Eye Color",
                  "Height",
                  "Weight",
                  "Driver License #",
                  "Issuing State",
                  "Expires",
                  "Date Issued"
                ]
              }
            }
          },
          "auditPath" : [
            "EvcUH4xDiiWod6VYG39bAsSQKM7AtdNHCHTE2GPLw5Kj",
            "E8Kzg3K3VQujqBVGv3t2coJaMwbDai1XhrNsxUDo9qvJ",

            "3wsgjDJLixB18VjdKwFGqMTj1EuxzC4cdxFPS2vXL79q"
          ]
        }
      }
```
